title: 闪退。。
author: flytomc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 flytomc 于 2013-10-19 14:45 编辑 

装完mod以后再mojang停了几秒就闪退。
错误报告

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Quite honestly, I wouldn't worry myself about that.

replies.author: jiangye110
replies.txt_content: 貌似是mod冲突把  找到冲突的mod直接删掉 就好了

replies.author: 天空の遗迹
replies.txt_content: Better Ore Distribution的问题，请检查一下安装是否正确安装，原帖说是直接拖进jar文件，但我看到它似乎在coremods里面
